gate.creole.dates

Class DateNormalizer

  • java.lang.Object
    • gate.util.AbstractFeatureBearer
      • gate.creole.AbstractResource
        • gate.creole.AbstractProcessingResource
          • gate.creole.AbstractLanguageAnalyser
            • gate.creole.dates.DateNormalizer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    gate.creole.ANNIEConstants, gate.Executable, gate.LanguageAnalyser, gate.ProcessingResource, gate.Resource, gate.util.FeatureBearer, gate.util.NameBearer, Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DateAnnotationNormalizer

    @CreoleResource(name="Date Normalizer",
                interfaceName="gate.ProcessingResource",
                icon="date-normalizer.png",
                comment="provides normalized values for all known dates",
                helpURL="http://gate.ac.uk/userguide/sec:misc-creole:datenormalizer")
public class DateNormalizer
extends gate.creole.AbstractLanguageAnalyser
    A GATE PR which attempts to normalise dates within a document against the date at which the document was written or published. This PR wraps the open source Date Parser library to perform the normalisation.
    Author:
    Mark A. Greenwood
    See Also:
    The GATE User Guide, Serialized Form
